text: a rescue of a group of fishermen just
moments before their boat sank in fairly
rough seas now the vessel was to the
north of the Isle of Lewis off the west

with water the rescue helicopter dropped
a salvage pump to clear water from the
boat but that was swamped so he boat
started to sink and the footage just
shows the fishermen scrambling on the
upturned Stern of that boat as a winch
